en.title: Tiroti's Fiery Personality
en.content: When the crew of the Kiss of Death doubted Tiroti's ability to lead them through the cold fog to find precious treasure, she proved them wrong with her fists. Together with the Kiss of Death, Tiroti made a name for herself on the Stormy Sea. Any cargo ship that crossed her path had no choice but to follow her rules and offer tribute. What do you think of Tiroti's fiery personality? Let us know in <#993381735599443988>!

de.content: Als die Crew der Kiss of Death an Tirotis FÃ¤higkeit zweifelte, sie durch den kalten Nebel zu fÃ¼hren, um kostbare SchÃ¤tze zu finden, bewies sie ihnen mit ihren FÃ¤usten das Gegenteil. Zusammen mit der Kiss of Death machte sich Tiroti auf der Stormy Sea einen Namen. Jedes Frachtschiff, das ihren Weg kreuzte, hatte keine andere Wahl, als ihren Regeln zu folgen und Tribut zu zollen. Was hÃ¤ltst du von Tirotis feuriger PersÃ¶nlichkeit? Lass es uns in <#993381735599443988> wissen!

en.title: Holiday Goodies and Exclusive Promo Code
en.content: The Viking Rise team announces new holiday content, including the Snow Realm Deer Decor Item and new Hero Skins for Margit (Enchanted Snowy Night) and Bjorn (Holiday Carols). Additionally, players can claim the special promo code VRXMAS2025 as a thank you for the memories made this year. Be sure to claim the code before its expiry on January 15th, 2026.
